code: import React,{useState}from"react";import Header from"./Header";import Note from"./Note";import Footer from"./Footer";import notes from"./notes";import CreateArea from"./CreateArea";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function App(){const[notes,setNotes]=useState([]);function addNote(newNote){setNotes(prevNotes=>{return[...prevNotes,newNote];});}function deleteNote(id){setNotes(prevNotes=>{return prevNotes.filter(noteItem,index=>{return index!==id;});});}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Header,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CreateArea,{onAdd:addNote}),notes.map((noteItem,index)=>{return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Note,{id:index,title:noteItem.title,content:noteItem.content,onDelete:deleteNote},index);}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Footer,{})]});};export default App;
